refnamediv.refpurpose: Create a tabbed dialog for setting properties and preferences.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Signal Prototypes

refsect2.title: struct GnomePropertyBox

warning.para: GnomePropertyBox is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: An opaque widget representing a property box. Items should be added to this widget using gnome_property_box_append_page.

refsect2.title: gnome_property_box_new ()

warning.para: gnome_property_box_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a new GnomePropertyBox widget. The PropertyBox widget is useful for making consistent configuration dialog boxes.
When a setting has been made to a property in the PropertyBox your program needs to invoke the gnome_property_box_changed to signal a change (this will enable the Ok/Apply buttons).

refsect2.title: gnome_property_box_changed ()

warning.para: gnome_property_box_changed is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: When a setting has changed, the code needs to invoke this routine to make the Ok/Apply buttons sensitive.

listitem.simpara: The GnomePropertyBox that contains the changed data

refsect2.title: gnome_property_box_set_modified ()

warning.para: gnome_property_box_set_modified is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This sets the modified flag of the GnomePropertyBox to the value in state. Affects whether the OK/Apply buttons are sensitive.

listitem.simpara: The GnomePropertyBox that contains the changed data
The state. TRUE means modified, FALSE means unmodified.

refsect2.title: gnome_property_box_append_page ()

warning.para: gnome_property_box_append_page is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Appends a new page to the GnomePropertyBox.

listitem.simpara: The property box where we are inserting a new page
The widget that is being inserted
The widget used as the label for this confiugration page
the assigned index of the page inside the GnomePropertyBox or -1 if one of the arguments is invalid.

warning.para: gnome_property_box_set_state is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

listitem.simpara: The GnomePropertyBox that contains the changed data
The state. TRUE means modified, FALSE means unmodified.
